amendment.description: To prohibit funds to be used to establish, apply, or enforce certain goals relating to Federal employees and public-private competitions or work force conversions, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 247 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 50. Record Vote Number: 26.

action.text: Amendment SA 247 proposed by Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 61. (consideration: CR S1423-1426; text: CR S1423) To prohibit funds to be used to establish, apply, or enforce certain goals relating to Federal employees and public-private competitions or work force conversions, and for other purposes.
